title: Grapefruit & prawn salad with kaffir lime dressing

ingredients.item: 300g small salad potatoes, halved or cut into quarters depending on size
1 lime, finely grated zest and juice
2 fresh kaffir lime leaves, thinly sliced
1 small iceberg lettuce, cut into slim wedges

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220Â°C, gas mark 7. Toss the potatoes with the oil and 2 tbsp water in a roasting tin. Season, then roast for about 25 minutes until tender and golden.
Meanwhile, mix together the fish sauce, lime zest and juice, sugar, garlic, lime leaves and 1 tbsp water.
Divide the lettuce, potatoes, grapefruit and prawns between two plates and pour over the dressing.
